name: Tingyun

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

story: Amicassador of the Sky-Faring Commission of the Xianzhou Luofu.She travels with business delegates, forging trade relationships and alliances with many worlds.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Dislodged
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Soothing Melody
skills.description: Increases the ATK of a single ally and grants them Benediction. Ally with Benediction additionally deals minor Lightning Additional DMG when attacking.

skills.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
skills.description: Regenerates a target ally's Energy and increases their DMG dealt.

skills.name: Violet Sparknado
skills.description: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals minor Lightning Additional DMG to the same enemy.

skills.name: Gentle Breeze
skills.description: After using this Technique, this character immediately regenerates Energy for themselves.

eidolons.name: Windfall of Lucky Springs
eidolons.description: After using their Ultimate, the ally with Benediction gains a 20% increase in SPD for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Gainfully Gives, Givingly Gains
eidolons.description: The ally with Benediction regenerates 5 Energy after defeating an enemy. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

eidolons.name: Halcyon Bequest
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Jovial Versatility
eidolons.description: The DMG multiplier provided by Benediction increases by 20%.

eidolons.name: Sauntering Coquette
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Peace Brings Wealth to All
eidolons.description: Ultimate regenerates 10 more Energy for the target ally.
